md:
giải nghĩa từ "arrangement" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* arrangement (noun) = sự sắp xếp, sự bố trí

VD: The arrangement of the furniture in the room was very comfortable.

* arrangement (noun) = thỏa thuận, sự thỏa thuận

VD: They reached an arrangement to meet at 5 o'clock.

* arrangement (noun) = sự chuẩn bị, sự dàn xếp

VD: The band made an arrangement to play at the wedding.

Từ liên quan:

* arrange (verb) = sắp xếp, bố trí
* arranged (verb) = được sắp xếp, được bố trí
* arranging (verb) = đang sắp xếp, đang bố trí

VD: Can you arrange the flowers in a vase?

VD: The concert was arranged by the music school.

VD: She is arranging a party for her birthday.

  • arrangement (noun) = sự sắp xếp, sự bố trí

VD: The arrangement of the furniture in the room was very comfortable.

  • arrangement (noun) = thỏa thuận, sự thỏa thuận

VD: They reached an arrangement to meet at 5 o'clock.

  • arrangement (noun) = sự chuẩn bị, sự dàn xếp

VD: The band made an arrangement to play at the wedding.
